top_comments_top.body: I did some unspeakable things in RDR2.

About a month ago while playing gta5 I come out of a store while an NPC is walking by. As he's walking past his phone rings and he answers it and says something along the lines of "hey honey how's the baby?" Immediately after hearing this I shot him lol

In Fable 1 there's a door that says it will only open if you do something evil in front of it. I went to the church, got everyone to follow me, the slaughtered them in front of the door. It didn't open. Turns out you have to eat a chicken.
Constantly watched quiet's tiddies bounce in MGS5

Killed a family in Skyrim, stole all their food and belongings, and left the kid an orphan
